[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/OriginalDescription.png[/img]
This mod creates a new option in the "Architect" menu, called "Planning", with more options for planning.
Features: - 10 customizable planning designations; - Show/hide planning designations; - Control planning opacity; - Cut/copy/paste planning designations; - An option for control if planning designations should be removed when something is built or deconstructed on top of it. - Holding shift you can override others planning designations.
[b]This mod uses HugsLib and Harmony.[/b]
Contributors: - 53N4 - Spanish translation - Dango998 - Chinese Simplified translation - alextd - Option to reverse shift key usage
